      Returns:

    • readValidCancellation

      public Cancellation readValidCancellation()
      This method checks to see if a reservation number is correct or not. If it is validated it can be cancelled.
      Returns:
      The user's chosen cancellation reference based on the reservation number.

      Co-Creator: Edison Cai Instructs the user on completing different rooms and rooms details.
      Parameters:
